name: Botto's Escape
description:
Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2020

In this game, you play as the litte black robot called Botto.  Because Botto's battery is loosing energy, he has to get to the big green battery at the end of the level. If he touches one of the red walls or floors, he looses all his energy at once. Every 30 seconds, you loose control over one of his abilities. After 30 seconds, you can't crouch anymore, he can't sprint after 60, and after 90 seconds, he can only walk to the right.

You have to be fast, or you won't get to the goal in time!

Controls:

Space: Jump

WASD: Facing a direction.

AD:  walking

AD + left control: sprinting

AD + left shift: crouching

Left mousebutton: Dashing in the direction you faced last frame.

Escape: closes the game (There is no restart button).

It's my first Game Jam Game, I hope you will like it!
